name: SkyPickle
description:
My very first game, there might be things that don't work but it's playable.

controls: 

A and D to move 

S to drop

W or J to flap your wings

H to take a shit

K to dash (can be cancelled by turning around)

U to release a blast of diarrhea that clears projectiles

CTRL to self destruct

R to reset and SPACE to reset at the game over screen

SPACE to start the game in normal mode

T to start the game in "fuckaroundmode"  as  i call it

Ok now go and get that skypickle high score!!
